snippet.title: Space Adventure Cobra – The Awakening – Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
In this Reveal Teaser, discover the first images of Space Adventure Cobra - The Awakening, which marks the return of Cobra, the legendary Space Corsair. 

Starting in 2025, this action platformer adapts the first 12 episodes of the animated series and takes on the terrible Space Pirates.

Wishlist the Game right now:
- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2878220/Space_Adventure_Cobra__The_Awakening
- PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10008749

#spacecobra #cobra #cobratheawakening #aventure #gaming #plateformer #tvshow #anime 

Website: https://www.microids.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Microids_off
